targets.expr: sum(celery_queue_length{namespace="$namespace", service_name="$service_name"}) by (queue_name)
sum(celery_worker_up{namespace="$namespace", service_name="$service_name"}) by (worker)
sum(celery_worker_tasks_active{namespace="$namespace", service_name="$service_name"}) by (worker)
sum(celery_active_consumer_count{namespace="$namespace", service_name="$service_name"}) by (queue_name)
sum(celery_active_worker_count{namespace="$namespace", service_name="$service_name"}) by (queue_name)
sum(celery_active_process_count{namespace="$namespace", service_name="$service_name"}) by (queue_name)
